title: 2. IRRI Agronomy Challege: Laser Leveling (4 January 2012)

tasks.task: Leveling the field for rice cultivation
subtasks: Understanding the importance of water and weed control
Recognizing the role of consistent water levels in seedling survival
Realizing the connection between water control and weed management
Preparing for wet seeded rice cultivation
Aiming for a high yield by ensuring good plant establishment
Assessing the effectiveness of laser leveling equipment
Confirming that the soil is level using electronic implements
Verifying the completion of the levelling task
Preparing the field for drum seeding in two days
